name: AttachPlayerObjectToPlayer
warnings: This function was removed in SA-MP 0.3.
description: The same as AttachObjectToPlayer but for objects which were created for player.
params_title: (objectplayer, objectid, attachplayer, Float:OffsetX, Float:OffsetY, Float:OffsetZ, Float:rX, Float:rY, Float:rZ)

params_body.name: objectplayer
params_body.description: The id of the player which is linked with the object.

params_body.name: objectid
params_body.description: The objectid you want to attach to the player.

params_body.name: attachid
params_body.description: The id of the player you want to attach to the object.

params_body.name: Float:OffsetX
params_body.description: The distance between the player and the object in the X direction.

params_body.name: Float:OffsetY
params_body.description: The distance between the player and the object in the Y direction.

params_body.name: Float:OffsetZ
params_body.description: The distance between the player and the object in the Z direction.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
